    • Method Detail

      • ApplyInterference

        public static void ApplyInterference(com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.ShipVariantAPI shipVariant)
        Reduces a ship's passive dissipation if more than one weapon causing interferences is installed. The strength of the effect has a quadratic growth with the number of such weapons installed.
        Parameters:
        shipVariant - Variant of the ship affected by the interference debuff

      • loadInterference

        public static void loadInterference()

      • getTotalInterference

        public static java.lang.Float getTotalInterference(com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.ShipVariantAPI shipVariant)
        Parameters:
        shipVariant - Variant of the ship affected by the interferences
        Returns:
        Uncapped reduction of the flux dissipation caused by the interfering weapons

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> getDebuffs(com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.ShipVariantAPI shipVariant)
        Parameters:
        shipVariant - Variant of the ship affected by the interferences
        Returns:
        Map of the mounts fitted with a weapon with interference, with their current individual effects
